'Mariela Castro's March: Cuba's LGBT Revolution' is a 2016 documentary film by Jon Alpert for HBO about Mariela Castro's (Ra√∫l Castro's daughter and Fidel Castro's niece) LGBT advocacy work in Cuba.
See also
* LGBTQ rights in Cuba
